Moo::StateRecorder

Moo::StateRecorder Class Reference

This class implements a d3d effect state manager that records all the d3d states, vertex shaders, pixel shaders etc, so they can be played back at a later time in the same frame. More...

#include <effect_state_manager.hpp>

struct  RenderState

struct  TextureStageState

Detailed Description

This class implements a d3d effect state manager that records all the d3d states, vertex shaders, pixel shaders etc, so they can be played back at a later time in the same frame.
